name: REBOOT's Adventure
description:
This is a story on a rouge robot who wants to save the world. Only problem is the artifact required to reboot all the other robots is heavily guarded by slave robots, laser bows, GlItChEs, and the big master robot itself. Will you be able to guide the rebooted robot through the maze of traps with only a short range gun on hand? Or will you get captured trying?

Patch 1.1: Made turrets face the right direction while shooting.
